text: Hey <@U02F8TTPU> and <@U026PHQ3J> just loped you both in on an email from Andy and Annie - sounds like we're running into the same issue with the latest build where they need to uninstall and reinstall to see new content. Can we look into this and see if there's a fix that got overridden or that we can put in place for the build we're pushing today?
Just read that... Will work on it first thing when I get in today. I wish I knew what the issue was so I can thoroughly test and fix it
hm.
let me think about this one
If there are any questions that will help suss it out we can use that thread to ask the team.
The original note didn't provide much insight
Yeah, I can't reproduce it or find any problem in the logging I've put in, it shows all the zips are up to date

But if there is a problem that I can reproduce and investigate by following a procedure, that would help a lot
Yea for sure
Like some steps to reproduce and a description of what's wrong (old content displaying?)
Why don't I pass this info back to the team and see if there are more specific reproduction steps they can provide.
I did make some changes to the updater in the last week, so if they're still seeing it on the 0.9 build distributed via Fabric, the 1.0 build should be improved
Ok, let me bubble this up and get repro steps. Maybe that will help us pinpoint if last week's updates may resolve the issue they're seeing.
1.0 has been distributed via Fabric (and has the new icon)
awesome, thanks for the head's up Marissa

The abridged release notes:
Map results cards
Onboarding screens with content and transitions
About screen content
JIRA issues
super helpful thanks, i have the detailed list of jira issues you hit
<@U02F8TTPU>: andy might be having some issues downloading this latest build
<@U026103R3|abby> uploaded a file: <https://uncorked.slack.com/files/abby/F065610CV/screen_shot_2015-06-09_at_3.08.12_pm.png|Screen Shot 2015-06-09 at 3.08.12 PM.png>
From my plugin, it says BroadwaySTAGE 1.0 distributed at 3:03pm... I don't know why the crashlytics app is failing
I didn't change the package name or anything that I know would mess it up, just bumpbed the versionName and versionCode
hmm, he's going to try to uninstall and reinstall and see if that works
Crashlytics had an update last week, so if his crashlytics app is on the previous version, maybe it needs to update to use their latest APIs
ah interesting
sounds like he's downloaded the latest
my plugin now says that 4 people have installed it
annie, pete, ramona and andy
ok sounds like they got it to install successfully
but had to unstill and reinstall
weird

<@U02F8TTPU>: just a head's up that Andy is going to take a look at the latest build and spend some time in JIRA tonight. so you may see issues come in for lots of little tweaks now that we're getting closer
he specifically mentioned the results cards and getting closer to the designs, so just look out for those and we'll triage accordingly
Sounds good, thanks for the heads up abby
